### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) 

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))
Connected by pipe group (fluid system 25302) and pipe group (fluid system 25306)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills but being out of fuel
-  Ensure that the burner mining drills have sufficient fuel before starting the mining operation
### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnaces have the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting operation
### Errors when using steam engines but having no input liquid
-  Ensure that the steam engines have the required input liquid before starting the operation
### Errors when using boilers but being out of fuel
-  Ensure that the boilers have sufficient fuel before starting the operation
### Errors when placing entities but having no coal or pipes in inventory
-  Ensure that the agent has sufficient coal and pipes in the inventory before attempting to place entities that require them
